definitions.body: Tammuz (Bab. Dûzu (also Dumuzi) COT:Ez Eze 8:14 Zim:KAT3, 397 f. Jastr:Rel. Bab. 482 et Pass.; on the phonetic change Hpt:ZA ii. 270, but also Jäger:BAS i. 591);—´[[מְבַכּוֹת אֶת־הַיּ]]: Ez Eze 8:14; ´[[ת]]: = Gk. Adonis ([[אדון]]); cf. Baud:Rel. Sem. i. 35. 300 f Dr:Da 11:37 Che:Ency. Bib.TAMMUZ Say:Hast. DB ID..
